statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT room_id, humidity FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_sensors_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, room_id, temperature, humidity FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE room_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT room_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM smart_home_sensors_data GROUP BY room_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM smart_home_sensors_data
SELECT * FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, room_id, reading FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_type, timestamp FROM smart_home_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE reading BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY reading ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, room_id, reading, timestamp FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE room_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY reading DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, room_id FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY room_id ASC, sensor_id ASC;
SELECT model_name, description, accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY model_name;
SELECT model_id, model_name, accuracy, last_trained FROM machine_learning_models WHERE last_trained > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location, measurement_type FROM sensors_data WHERE value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, measurement_type, value FROM sensors_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors_data WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT * FROM sensors_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location, value FROM sensors_data ORDER BY location, sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, measurement_type FROM sensors_data WHERE measurement_type='Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id < 10 AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_type, accuracy FROM models WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC, model_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, reading FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING data_count > 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, reading FROM sensors WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location LIKE '%room%' ORDER BY location ASC, sensor_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY value DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY data_count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensors.sensor_type, sensor_data.value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_data.value < 10 ORDER BY sensors.sensor_id ASC, sensor_data.value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM smart_home_sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM smart_home_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM smart_home_sensors GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_name, location_name FROM smart_home_sensors JOIN locations ON smart_home_sensors.location = locations.location_name;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50;
